title: Automatic Syncing of Edits
description: Changes that affect the score of the lead often aren't immediately reflected. Changes to the activity tabs for leads and customers sometimes aren't immediatey reflected.
workaround: Visit a different tab in the application and then return to see the updated changes.

title: AI Assistant Errors
description: Otterbot is still in beta testing. It does not currently reflect all your data and improvements are being made to improve its training and knowledge of the software.
workaround: Try to give more clear direction or data to the context of your request. Reach out to support@otternautcrm.com for additional questions or support.

title: Kanban Drag and Drop Bug
description: Occasionally leads or tasks that are moved into different columns are shuffled to a different position than where they were originally placed.
workaround: Scroll or toggle the column to find the desired lead or task.
